Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: The countdown to the upcoming federal budget has sparked a flurry of activity and comments on social media. People are curious about the potential outcomes and beneficiaries of the budget. Some speculate about the impact on illegal text message scammers or on supporting the 'missing middle.' Others disapprove of past decisions such as heightening poverty levels for single mothers. Meanwhile some individuals imagine drastic cigarette and cigar price increases under a potential Labor budget. Independent MP zdaniel spoke to RN Breakfast about expanding single-parent payments and stage 3 tax cuts fueling anticipation for the official reveal.
